practice_phrases.known: I wouldn't have dared to go there.

lego.known: I wouldn't have dared to tell her

practice_phrases.known: I wouldn't have dared to tell her the truth.
I wouldn't have dared to tell her about it.
I wouldn't have dared to tell her that.

practice_phrases.known: I wouldn't have dared to tell her the news.
